info.title: GTSC - API Server
info.description: REST API for Global Trade and Supply Chain - API Server.

tags.name: Info
tags.description: Information endpoints for the REST server.

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Authentication endpoints for the REST server.

tags.name: Identity
tags.description: Service to provide all features related to digital identity.

tags.name: Identity Profile
tags.description: Service to provide all features related to digital identity profiles.

tags.name: Blob Storage
tags.description: Endpoints which are modelled to access a blob storage contract.

tags.name: NFT
tags.description: Endpoints which are modelled to access an NFT contract.

tags.name: Attestation
tags.description: Endpoints which are modelled to access an attestation contract.

get.summary: Get the information for the server

informationResponse.summary: The response for the information request.

400.description: The server cannot process the request, see the error field for more details.

401.description: You are not authorized to use the API or no credentials were supplied, see the error field for more details.

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle, see the error field for more details.

healthResponseOK.summary: The response for the health request.

healthResponseError.summary: The response for the health request with errors.

get.summary: Get the list of profile data for identities

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: The filters to apply to the list, comma separated list with color between key and value for each pair e.g. prop1:value1,prop2:value2.

parameters.name: propertyNames
parameters.description: The properties to get for the profile, defaults to all, should be a comma separated list.

requestBody.description: Transfer the attestation to a new holder.

properties.description: Any additional information for the error.

stack.description: The stack trace for the error.

notFoundId.description: The id if the item that was not found.

properties.description: Any additional information for the error.

stack.description: The stack trace for the error.

NotFoundResponse.description: The body which contains the error.

properties.description: Any additional information for the error.

stack.description: The stack trace for the error.

ConflictResponse.description: The body which contains the error.

HealthStatus.description: The health status of the component.

token.description: The access token for future requests.

namespace.description: The namespace of the connector to use for the identity, defaults to service configured namespace.

DidDocument.description: Interface describing a DID Document. Spec https://www.w3.org/TR/did-core/#did-document-properties.

publicKeyMultibase.description: The public key for the entry. Spec https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/draft-multiformats-multibase-03 .

DidDocumentVerificationMethod.description: Interface describing a DID document verification method.

use.description: The intended use for the key.

key_ops.description: The operation(s) that the key is intended to be used for.

Jwk.description: The fields in a JSON Web Key.

JwtAlgorithms.description: The cryptographic algorithms supported for JSON Web Tokens and JSON Web Keys.

DidService.description: Interface describing a did document service.

identity.description: The identity to create the profile for.

IdentityProfileProperty.description: Interface describing a contract which provides profile operations.

cursor.description: An optional cursor, when defined can be used to call find to get more entities.

blob.description: The data to store in base64 encoding.

namespace.description: The namespace to store the data in, defaults to service configured namespace.

issuer.description: The issuer for the NFT, will also be the initial owner.

immutableMetadata.description: The immutable metadata for the NFT.

namespace.description: The namespace of the connector to use for the NFT, defaults to service configured namespace.

NftMintRequest.description: The data to be used in the minting.

tag.description: The tag data for the NFT.

immutableMetadata.description: The immutable data for the NFT.

NftTransferRequest.description: The data to be used in the transfer.

NftUpdateRequest.description: The data to be used in the update.

controllerAddress.description: The controller address for the attestation.

verificationMethodId.description: The identity verification method to use for attesting the data.

namespace.description: The namespace of the connector to use for the attestation, defaults to service configured namespace.

AttestationAttestRequest.description: The data to be used in the signing.

AttestationAttestResponse.description: The result of the attestation process.

id.description: The unique identifier of the attestation.

created.description: Created date/time of the attestation in ISO format.

transferred.description: Transferred date/time of the attestation in ISO format, can be blank if holder identity is owner.

holderIdentity.description: The identity of the current holder, can be undefined if owner is still the holder.

AttestationInformation.description: Interface describing the collated attestation information.

failure.description: The failure message if the attestation is not verified.

AttestationVerifyResponse.description: The data returned from the verification response.

AttestationTransferRequest.description: The parameters to be used in the transfer.

AttestationTransferResponse.description: The data returned from the transfer response.
